title: Can we read novels that has fiction (bringing dead back to life, sorcery, zombies) Assim al hakeem
transcript: adesh uh she said she's asked me a question a number of times on the website and I am getting old when I get frustrated of the same question being repeated from different angles I simply say I don't know she why are you holding back knowledge I'm not holding back knowledge when something is as dubious as this meaning novels are not based on true stories and therefore Scholars say that it is permissible to put fiction into it but the limit of fiction has to be defined so if you put fiction bringing people to life after death or changing a man into a donkey or sorcery or zombies or killing people and making a living out of it and things that are un Islamic we have to to draw the line so when she continued to ask about two boys twins being reincarnated having powers having this and that such novels are not the end of the world if you don't read them so don't read them when she insists on saying no I have to have a clear answer I said I don't know
